front.title: OSPF Link Traffic Engineering Attribute Reuse

abstract.t: Various link attributes have been defined in OSPF in the context of the MPLS Traffic Engineering (TE) and GMPLS. Since the original RSVP-TE use case was defined, additional applications (e.g., SRTE, LFA) have been defined which also make use of the link attribute advertisements. This document defines how to distribute link attributes in OSPFv2 and OSPFv3 for applications other than MPLS TE or GMPLS.
